title: Nanotech Cleanroom Adventure #37
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Decontamination Airlock
rooms.description: A sterile white chamber with gleaming metal walls and bright LED lighting. Air filtration systems hum quietly overhead. Hazmat suits hang on hooks beside a decontamination shower. Warning signs about particle contamination cover the walls. A security terminal blinks on a desk, and sealed storage lockers line one wall.

items.name: security desk
items.description: A metal desk with a computer terminal and several drawers

items.name: facility operations manual
items.description: A thick binder with operational procedures
items.text: NANOTECH RESEARCH FACILITY - Established 2045. Lead Scientist: Dr. Sarah Chen. Safety Officer: Dr. Marcus Webb. All personnel must complete decontamination before entering the Main Cleanroom. Combination to secure storage: facility establishment year.

items.name: security access keycard
items.description: A magnetic keycard labeled 'CLEANROOM ACCESS - AUTHORIZED PERSONNEL ONLY'

items.name: hazmat suit rack
items.description: A rack holding protective suits and equipment

items.name: protective safety goggles
items.description: High-grade protective eyewear for cleanroom work

items.name: contamination warning signs
items.description: Multiple signs with safety warnings and protocols
items.text: WARNING: Class 1 Cleanroom ahead. Particle count must remain below 10 per cubic meter. All research conducted in Main Cleanroom under supervision of Dr. Sarah Chen. Unauthorized access prohibited.

items.name: sealed storage locker
items.description: A metal locker with a biometric scanner

items.name: preliminary research notes
items.description: A notebook with handwritten observations
items.text: Dr. Chen's Notes: The nanobot prototypes are showing promising results. All active research is conducted in the Main Cleanroom. Dr. Webb handles all safety protocols. Remember: only authorized personnel can access the Control Center.

items.name: cleanroom access door
items.description: A heavy airlock door with a card reader and pressure seal. LED indicators show the room is ready for entry.

rooms.name: Main Cleanroom
rooms.description: A vast sterile chamber with white walls, floors, and ceiling. Electron microscopes and nanofabrication equipment line the workstations. Robotic arms hang suspended from ceiling tracks. The air is perfectly still and filtered. Holographic displays show molecular structures floating in mid-air. A sealed door to the Control Center glows with security indicators.

items.name: primary research workstation
items.description: A sophisticated workstation with multiple monitors and precision instruments

items.name: project status log
items.description: A digital tablet displaying recent research entries
items.text: PROJECT LOG - Lead Scientist Dr. Sarah Chen: Nanobot assembly proceeding on schedule. The nanobots are our primary research focus. Dr. Webb continues to ensure all safety protocols are followed. Control Center access restricted to authorized personnel only.

items.name: electron microscope
items.description: A massive microscope capable of viewing individual atoms
items.text: Microscope display shows nanoscale structures. Label reads: 'Property of Nanotech Research Facility - Dr. Sarah Chen, Lead Scientist'

items.name: nanofabrication chamber
items.description: A sealed chamber where nanobots are assembled
items.text: Chamber status: STANDBY. Last operation: Nanobot prototype assembly. Operator: Dr. Chen. Note: All nanobot research conducted in this cleanroom.

items.name: supply cabinet
items.description: A cabinet containing cleanroom supplies and materials

items.name: personnel roster
items.description: A document listing facility staff and their roles
items.text: FACILITY PERSONNEL: Dr. Sarah Chen - Lead Scientist, Nanobot Research. Dr. Marcus Webb - Safety Officer, Protocol Enforcement. Tech Rodriguez - Equipment Maintenance. All research activities take place in the Main Cleanroom.

items.name: sterile cleanroom wipes
items.description: Ultra-clean wipes for maintaining the sterile environment

items.name: holographic molecular display
items.description: A 3D projection system showing molecular structures
items.text: Display shows nanobot schematics with annotation: 'Breakthrough achieved! Our nanobots represent the cutting edge of nanotechnology. - Dr. Sarah Chen'

items.name: control center security door
items.description: A reinforced door with a biometric scanner and security terminal. Three verification questions are displayed on the screen.

password_questions.question: Who is the lead scientist?
password_questions.hint: Check the facility manual, project logs, and personnel roster

password_questions.question: What is the primary research focus?
password_questions.hint: Multiple documents mention what research is being conducted

password_questions.question: Where is research conducted?
password_questions.hint: Look at the warning signs and project logs

rooms.name: Control Center
rooms.description: You've reached the facility Control Center! A high-tech command room with wall-to-wall monitors displaying facility systems, environmental controls, and security feeds. The main console shows all systems are stable. An emergency exit door stands open, revealing a decontamination corridor leading to the outside. Fresh air flows in from the exit. You're safe now!

items.name: main control console
items.description: The central control system for the entire facility, showing green status indicators across all systems

items.name: monitoring screens
items.description: Multiple displays showing real-time data from throughout the facility

items.name: emergency exit sign
items.description: A glowing sign indicating the safe exit route

rooms.win_message: SUCCESS! You've navigated through the Nanotech Cleanroom facility and reached the Control Center. The emergency exit leads you safely out of the facility. Your problem-solving skills and attention to detail have paid off. The mysteries of the cleanroom are solved, and you've escaped to safety. You win!
